disciplineJustification: Development and curation of adsorption isotherm data is a core chemical engineering activity.
Creation of database libraries, digitizer interfaces, and tutorials indicates expertise in information engineering and data management.
Registry and standardization of materials data involve workflows and systems typical of industrial and production engineering.
